website_summaries.verdict: Glamorous skin moisturizer that packs a punch at a reasonable price.
pros: Makes skin instantly smoother and soft
The cream is rich yet lightweight
Users say the cream made a positive difference in their skin right away
cons: Still expensive compared to drugstore brands

customer_reviews.title: Reversing sun damage.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this in conjunction with ORGANIC Vitamin C Serum for Face, Neck & Décolleté for Anti Aging, Age Spots, Acne & Neck Firming - BEST Anti Wrinkle Facial Treatment Serum with Natural Ingredients to Restore & Boost Collagen - 1 oz  For about 1.5 months for mu sun damaged face. First pics are before then after. I see a difference. My face is also smoother/softer. I have sensitive skin and have had no reaction to this.
customer_reviews.author: M. Crofford

customer_reviews.title: Kleem Anti Aging Retinol Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this Kleem Anti Aging Moisturizer. I only recently started using the Kleem Anti Aging Moisturizer for face and eye area; and I must say I truly am already noticing a difference in the feel and appearance of my skin. I highly recommend this product as a daily regimen for your face and eye area. I have used many different products over the years at a much higher price, however I feel I have finally came upon a product that delivers its claims. Thank you Amazon carrying this product and shipping it to me so quickly as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Te'a

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews about products I have purchased; however, I am impressed with this Kleem anti aging retinal moisturizer. I have been applying it day and evening for almost two weeks and have actually seen a difference in my skin. I have fair skin with some freckles. Since using this product, I have noticed a more even skin tone and wrinkles around my eyes have somewhat diminished. I am pleasantly surprised. Great product and great price. I have tried many face products in my 67 years, and I like this the best!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Changes
customer_reviews.text: I've noticed some amazing changes in my skin while using products from Kleem Organics. I'm 66 years old and my skin looks healthy and more youthful since I have been using Kleem Organics. My wrinkles are less noticeable. My complexion is clearer and brighter. The age spots seem to be disappearing. I haven't had any skin irritation like I've experienced with other skin care brands. I highly recommend trying this product.
customer_reviews.author: kathy munson

customer_reviews.title: WONDERDUL, HYDRATING CREAM!!
customer_reviews.text: I just LOVE this cream. I really am trying to go organic with skincare and I saw this and thought id take a chance. I worked for Estee Lauder for years and the more I research, the more I feel that organic is the way to go. Im in my 40's and I have beautiful skin. This cream only makes it better. You want ingredients that nourish...you must feed your skin with magic. This is wonderful. Easy applicator and smells of Vitamin C. Thank you for inventing such a lovely product.🌟🌟🌟💜💜💜
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer preas

customer_reviews.title: The cream feels great, just the right amount of moisture for my ...
customer_reviews.text: If I could review the cream and its packaging separately, I would. The cream feels great, just the right amount of moisture for my skin. I've been using it for several months, and I think I may detect an improvement in wrinkles. The problem for me is the price. If it were $30-worth of moisturizer, that would be one thing, but the jar has a false bottom, making it appear like a larger bottle of moisturizer than it is. The product details description advertise 7 oz., but the bottle reads 1.7 oz. I have to give the moisturizer a 4 and the packaging a 1 for an average of 2.5.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this since I received it in early November. I haven't noticed any reduction in the appearance of fine lines. What it has done is cause more blackheads and breakouts. I don't feel that it really absorbed into my skin. The scent is a pleasant citrus smell. It might work for other people, but it didn't do anything for me.
customer_reviews.author: KRG

customer_reviews.title: It's Not for Everyone
customer_reviews.text: First of all, it did not go on smoothly like most other face creams I have used. Then, after the third day of use, I developed a rash on may face and chin. I have never had any type of allergic reaction to anything in my life, but there must be something in this product that caused this issue. I stopped using it and the rash and itching have begun to disappear.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny M

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: It's fine...but the seller sounds multiple harassing emails even after being asked to stop. Will not order again due to the harassment.
customer_reviews.author: Tejas

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: Beware of this moisturizer if you have sensitive skin!!!!! After using this product for only four days my face felt like it was burning and it had a super sharp sting to it. I immediately stopped using it and washed the product off my face. My face looked like it had been acid etched and I had a massive allergic reaction. My face is still peeling from this and it’s been a week! Needless to say I returned it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Cream!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. It has a pleasant very light citrus smell. The dispenser works perfectly. I saw dark spots begin to fade immediately. My skin looks more firm and the skin tone is brighter. I liked it so much I also ordered the Kleem Vitamin C Serum. I love that too. The two products together have my face looking much better. Most retinol products have been too harsh and made my face red. This doesn't. I highly recommend this Cream.
customer_reviews.author: QKA

customer_reviews.title: ... recently started trying organic products and haven't been overly satisfied with their ability to actually work on fine lines
customer_reviews.text: I recently started trying organic products and haven't been overly satisfied with their ability to actually work on fine lines and wrinkles... BUT this product works GREAT! I have seen a visible difference in my skin since I started using KLEEM. Not to mention the hyaluronic acid/Retinol A in it that normally can irritate my sensative skin has NOT done that at all. My face looks great and I even lost the ashy under tones that my skin has during the winter months. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: I hate the pump feature
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about 3 months now. Don't see much change at all. Will give it a try one more time. I don't know what's the hype about this cream. The main reason for giving it a one star is the packaging. I hate the pump feature! Why not let me choose how much I want to dispense. Plus I feel the jar gets empty much faster. I hope they read this! That pump turns me off and it will be one of the reasons I will not purchase this cream. Hope they will fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISEMENT , LISTED INGREDIENTS DIFFERENT THAN ACTUAL INGREDIENTS
customer_reviews.text: This product is shamelessly FALSE ADVERTISEMENT. Not only does it claim to have only natural ingredients and to be alcohol free but the ingredients listed on amazon ARE DIFFERENT than the ingredients listed on the box of the product that you get. It says NO ALOCHOL and it lists on the box you get that is has CETYL ALCOHOL. if you don’t know what Cetyl alcohol is and why you should look for products that don’t have it you need to look it up, IT AGES YOUR FACE OVERTIME. Amazon shouldn’t have this on their site. This is a scam!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Mold

customer_reviews.title: Acne all over due to use
customer_reviews.text: I asked to return but they said to keep using it. I got acne all over my face.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Tariq

customer_reviews.title: Very light lotion, not for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Lasted less than one month, quality seemed alright if you have oily skin. If your skin is dry this is not for you. I watched the video and read the PDF, followed all directions. I had to apply two coats each morning and night and my skin looked extremely dry still. Very excited initially but now disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product. The cream left my face with big reddish purple lumps. I kept using it only with less cream thinking my skin just needed to adjust to it. The bumps slowed down but I noticed after a week of use, the skin around my eyes started turning yellow. Another couple of days and my skin started turning brownish and started getting age spots. (I'm 63). I made a new batch of my homemade face cream and within 2 days my face is clear and all the age spots are almost gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and the next morning my skin is so soft enabling me to easily put on my foundation without any dryness
customer_reviews.text: I am 30 and have consistently been rotating through different products and trying new ones, but now this is all I use. I have very sensitive skin and this product does not irritate my skin at all, and the next morning my skin is so soft enabling me to easily put on my foundation without any dryness. I have already told my mom and best friend about this product, and I will continue to use this as my anti-aging moisturizer. For soft, healthy skin, I remove my makeup without harsh products or scrubbing, and then use this every night and sometimes in the morning, too. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: MeganKreu

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: My coworker was insistent I purchase this. On the super positive side: It smells amazing, it’s lightweight & effective with moisturizing. On the deflated side: I haven’t seen any noteworthy changes in my skin quality after two-plus months of use (and I have been using with the eye serum as well). On the brighter side: The dispenser does help with making sure you use the correct amount when applying (which is nice). It’s lasted longer than anticipated. Funny/not funny: a fruit fly dive bombed my face for about an hour a few weeks ago. I was losing my mind!! It took me a while to realize it was because My face smelled like a delicious orange 🙄😂🤦🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Day

customer_reviews.title: LOW QUALITY PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.text: This used to be a product that I used to adore, but apparently, the composition of the product has changed and now it seems to be a product of poor quality. The consistency is so liquid that several times the cream has fallen to the ground when trying to remove it from the container. The new citrus aroma that has been added smells OK but has caused the product to lose quality. It seems that I am paying too much money for a poor quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Jostin Narváez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this moisturizer! I, initially, purchased it soley because it is cruelty free. Honestly, I didn't expect to like it as much as I do. My skin is a little on the oily side & moisturizers typically will cause some blemishes. My skin responds perfectly to this moisturizer. I have used moisturizers that contained retinol in the past, that left areas on my face dry - not so with kleem! I am happy with this product and intend to use it consistently throughout the seasons. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a daily moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: SuzyQ

customer_reviews.title: Great cream
customer_reviews.text: It's just been a week since I started using this cream. I like how it tingles just a little, and how moisturizing it is. It has a light smell, nothing unpleasant or overwhelming. The packaging is great too. I will leave another review later depending on how efficacious it is. I've used a ton of Retin-A creams, we will see if this one stands up. I'm 38 with combo skin.
customer_reviews.author: Megyn Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: A definite no
customer_reviews.text: This product made my boyfriends face completely break out immediately upon use. He has pretty sensitive skin so I told him to stick it out and see if he adjusts. When he didn’t, he discontinued use and I tried it out. I RARELY break out. I usually have approximately two pimples a year. Within 24 hours of using this I had a giant zit on one side of my face and a cluster of zits on the other side. This is going in the trash. Also, the headline for this product read that it was eye cream but no where on the bottle does it instruct use around the eyes or indicate that it’s safe for the eye area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product , Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I contacted Kleem regarding damage to the product during shipping (Amazon fulfills shipping on this product). Matteo responded right away and after sending pictures of the damaged product, he replaced my moisturizer free of charge. Excellent customer service that truly cares about and believes in their product. Besides that, the product itself is amazing. I have only used it twice at this point, but it went on soft, not greasy, my foundation smoothed over it and my skin looked great all day. Usually by the end of the day my skin looks oily in some areas and dry in others. You will love this product and the people who stand behind it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gillooly

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Yeah no. I bought this cream bc I’m in search of a moisturizer that hydrates well and isn’t going to give me cancer, and since it’s marketed as organic/all natural I thought “Sure! Let’s try this!” Nay. It burns and stings when applied and I tossed it. Anything that burns/stings when applied is prob not good for you. Just sayin
customer_reviews.author: James P

customer_reviews.title: Citrus Scent
customer_reviews.text: I love the packaging and the pump design of this cream. It performs as advertised. The citrus smells is okay. I prefer non-scented creams. The scent smells like oranges. It does sting a minute amount when I first apply the cream, which concerns me for long term use. My skin is sensitive and the stinging sensation, though minimal, could be an issue. My skin feels nice and smooth when I use the cream, although I do not notice a difference in the fine lines I have.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: You will look younger
customer_reviews.text: Great unique dispenser. See benefits immediately - firmer toned brighter skin. . I use all over my face and eyes twice daily (not sure if meant just once a day?). I ran out of it and my face didn’t look as young. I use 70-90 spf daily as well. I added the company’s vitamin c serum at night and see brighter skin as well. Won’t be without these two products ever. I worked in the skincare industry for 10 years with access to all of the best products. Retinol and vitamin c and sunblock are the essentials. I couldn’t use pure forms of Rx retinol as it dries out my skin and very tough to apply correctly.
customer_reviews.author: opinionchick

customer_reviews.title: Very little actual cream
customer_reviews.text: This packaging is very deceptive. It seems as if you have quite a bit, however, unscrew the upper level and you will see the small amount you actually have. Now, to be fair, the actual contents is fairly close to most other same type of product. I just wish these manufacturers realized women are not stupid, nor can we be easily fooled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The product is one of the best I've tried. You also feel the tightening happen within minutes. Works well for day and night. I have skin tags on my eye lids and notice them shrink as I use this. However it does have a scent. So people who are sensitive to scents may have an issue. But it does go away quickly. My wife uses it by mixing it with her makeup and loves it. Only thing she doesn't like is the scent. She has sensitivity. This would be a 5 star if it wasn't for the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Df186

customer_reviews.title: Feels great!
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the product feels and it smells nice. I'm a guy and the fragrance is not lady-like but reminds me of citrus and mango. Absorbs nicely and keeps my face soft all day. Seems to be very high quality. I can tell, I've used so many products. I love the dispensing of the container. Easy to control the amount. Great price point. Can't tell results yet, only been using a week or so. I recommend you try it out!
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: It Does What It Says
customer_reviews.text: I held off writing this for awhile as I wanted to give it a decent chance and I have to say I really do notice a difference in my skin. I'm looking better and no one could be more surprised than me as I've tried everything on the market and not been thrilled with anything. Kleem, is making a noticeable difference in texture, dark circles and wrinkles, I'm impressed, very impressed and happy with what I'm seeing. I was looking my age and didn't like what I was seeing, feel like Kleem, has repaired about ten years of serious skin abuse. Be sure to use the Vit C serum as well.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Macey Lester

customer_reviews.title: Good solid retinol product. Try it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd bottle I've bought from Kleem. I first tried their retinol moisturizer when it was on a lightning deal and found it to be a good product. I've tried other retinol products and Kleem stands out. Kleem goes on very smooth and creamy. It absorbs quickly..is not greasy or drying and it moisturizes extremely well. My skin drinks it in. I like that it is organic. My lines are softened, my skin feels great and I have not had any bad reaction to it. I use it twice daily on face and neck. My neck area is much improved. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Donna D

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price, but not for the smell sensitive.
customer_reviews.text: I like the packaging and have had no sensitivity issues from this product. I haven't been using it long enough to judge its effectiveness, but I won't be buying it again because I can't stand the fragrance. This smells like food—like some kind of dessert I can't quite place—and while it is not overwhelming, it is unpleasant to me. The seller reached out (A+ service), concerned I had a bad jar. They sent me a new one, but it smells the same. While I don't like it, my husband does and actually uses this product now. As for the effectiveness, it seems to be comparable to others like Roc, and has a nice consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Tells Ya

customer_reviews.title: Do not believe the reviews
customer_reviews.text: I decided I'd switch to this product, based on the high number of reviews. Within less than a month of using it, my cheek started to break out. 8 pimples in 2 weeks a long with a rash. It feels moisturizing.. But pimples were coming out of no where, and I do not break at that much at all. I am mad. Now I gotta deal with the post acne marks and I had to order Curology to take care of the acne this product has given me. Such a waste of time, money and some insecurity, being in public with all the acne and rash. DO NOT GET THIS, PLEASE!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Liemthepha

customer_reviews.title: I do like it a whole lot
customer_reviews.text: It is my 2nd purchase of it. I love the fresh, invigorating smell, the way the cream comes out, and the luxurious look of the container. It is slightly thinner than I expected but I am told it depends on the time of the crops. Only 4 stars because I expected the retinol to dry out my super oily skin, at least a bit, but it doesn't and I used it twice daily. Does it work? I don't really know because I spend more time applying my skin routine than watching the results in the mirror. I do like how it feels though. The seller is very responsive to any question or issue. I will most likely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Nice cream / Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: *Watch for reviews that are not Verified Purchases!* I really liked this cream until my neck broke out in a huge red rash from an allergic reaction to it. Not the creams fault, but it still happened regardless. It has a nice, not overwhelming citrusy type smell and the pump kept the cream from getting under my nails. Had to immediately stop usage after only 5 days, though.
customer_reviews.author: Kymberlei

customer_reviews.title: Lessened age spots, works great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter hates the vitamin C smell of this cream, but I don't mind it at all. I think this cream really does what it says it will do, and it's a good price point for face cream if you don't want to spend a ton. It has definitely faded some of the age spots on my face and given me an even complexion. I have sensitive skin, but I'm not at all irritated by this. It's very moisturizing. I'm on my second jar and will continue to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M.

customer_reviews.title: Best product at any price!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this and the Kleen face serum for two years and my skin looks amazing! I am in my 60’s and have no creapy skin, and very few lines. My skin is hydrated, smooth and looks fabulous! I exfoliate my face and apply the serum to problem areas-around the mouth and center of forehead. I let the serum dry and then apply this moisturizer to my entire face and neck area. I do this morning and evening. I have very sensitive skin and this has never caused a problem. (It is NOT intended for your nose and I only mention this because of a review a read....) LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Good but pricey
customer_reviews.text: This product feels nice and smells good. It goes on smooth and doesn’t feel greasy or heavy at all. I’ve also noticed my skin looks a little brighter with use. The reason I am giving only 3 stars is price vs quantity. Using morning and night, this lasts just one month maybe 5 weeks. Products like R&F tout 3 months of product for about 3x this and while I thought that was too pricey, I may need to reconsider with how fast this is gone.
customer_reviews.author: folk fan

customer_reviews.title: A worthy anti-aging moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: Having lost weight in the past few months, the wrinkles in my face were obviously more prominent. In reviewing anti-aging moisturizers on Amazon, I ran across Kleem. Their product reviews were good, so I ordered it. I like the results so far. I use it both morning and at night. It does not cause any breakouts and has a nice citrus scent. I will continue to use it and have already ordered another jar. I use it sparingly as it tends to be a bit pricey. However, in spite of the price, it is a product I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DKH

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I am not paid by anyone for this review. I love this stuff. Kleem has done an outstanding job of improving my 67 year old skin. Red spots are gone, my skin has a better texture. Even my friends are remarking on how great my skin looks. The smell is light and citrusy. I use it morning and night and couldn’t be more pleased. I have ordered it again and I will be very disappointed if they stop producing it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri H. Dorbritz

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this retinol cream for several months now and just reordered. The cream is light, absorbs quickly and has a lovely citrus scent. I use this along with the Kleem Vitamin C serumr and just had a dermatologist tell me my skin is in really good shape and whatever I am doing to keep doing it! That was the best compliment and reinforcement that I am using the right products as I have tried many. I have tried countless different moisturizers and still do mix it up a bit with different products but this is one of the best.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn A. Natale

customer_reviews.title: iNSTRUCTIONS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gives a card that says scan to Facebook or type in website address. Neither works, I type in website sends me to Italian language site. I scan the code sends me to amazon. I want to like the product but feel its very sketchy since comes with no instructions and all sites go nowhere. I guess I will return.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t work so I contacted customer service. I asked why I haven’t seen results in 5 weeks like the advertisement states. He responded and said organic products take longer to work. I feel that’s misleading. Customer service is prompt in responding to concerns and the smell is great.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal B

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this stuff in the past and have LOVED it. For whatever reason, the one I just received smells different, is a different color, is super thick and has been breaking me out bad. I've heard about people receiving false products and wonder if that is what happened this time. Not very happy.
customer_reviews.author: LetsGetLost04

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this cream for a few days. I bought this cream mainly for my left side of face which faces the sunshine while driving all the time. So far so good. It smells good and not oily at all. Plus it absorbs very quickly. I will come back and update the effect after one or two months using.
customer_reviews.author: Yu Liu

customer_reviews.title: Caution for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: What I liked the most was the scent and not greasy feeling either. However I used it for over a month and my face started breaking out and my skin was flaking and peeling. I think it’s a good product, but just too strong for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tania T Clark

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work for me
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt work. Been using it for a few months and have not seen any difference in appearance. Makes me sad cuz I was really hoping that this will help. Wont be buy it again
customer_reviews.author: nohope

customer_reviews.title: New jar almost empty upon opening!
customer_reviews.text: Its been awhile since I ordered this because the one brand I originally purchased lasted alot longer than expected. Upon opening the jar the was only a small dab in the jar! It won't last but a few weeks at the price I paid I will go back to my original brand Arvesa!
customer_reviews.author: Kathi

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to switch to an anti-aging moisturizer due to lines on my forehead and between my eyebrows. I choose this one due to the great reviews and excellent price. I have been using it less than a week so I can’t tell a huge difference in wrinkles (which is understandable) but acne that has come in recently on my jawline and forehead has almost completely cleared up. It’s truly amazing. I love the pump dispenser and it’s a lighter moisturizer so it doesn’t make your face feel greasy and it doesn’t feel heavy once applied. Forget spending a ton of money on expensive moisturizers and give this one a try!
customer_reviews.author: Hkpink18

customer_reviews.title: Kleem works!
customer_reviews.text: A great product for helping to reduce the signs of aging. I am 53 and just started using this product. I find the cream soaks into my skin very well and doesn't feel greasy. I have combination skin and haven't had any problems with breakouts. I will continue to purchase this product as long is it gives satisfactory results. I really like the pump feature on the jar too. Someone else posted a picture of it. You can still remove the lid if you need to, but the pump supplies just the right amount to moisturize my whole face and neck.
customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Retinol Cream... Must to buy It!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something good for my skin. I have always had sensitive skin and this cream have done good things. The smells is lovely and the result that I have gotten with it are amazing. If you are looking and looking like me try Thisbe cream an see how this works on your skin. I will definitely will be buying this product again. My routine morning is : Vitamin C serum, the retinol and then sunscreen. People have been asking what are you putting on your skin?it is looking great. ☺️ At nigh: Vitamin C serum and retinol.
customer_reviews.author: NATALIA MARTINEZ

customer_reviews.title: Fast working!
customer_reviews.text: So I am all about sharing about products that I love because I base my purchases off what others reviewed. I honestly have only used this like 4 days in a row now and I can see the difference. My wrinkles under my eyes and on my forehead are disappearing. It smells kinda like orange glow 😂 but I love it ❤ super smooth, leaves my skin soft. The only downside.. I have got a few pimples from using this...and even with my facewash they have not gone away yet.. I am still going to continue this product and even if you have sensitive skin like me. I still think its worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: getrocked

customer_reviews.title: Actually works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second bottle of Kleem, and seriously, people are shocked when I tell them I'm 74 - they speculate I'm in my 50s. I have to add that I've always maintained a good exercise regimen for my body and stress that keeping one's mind exercised (reading, conversation, documentaries - not just pablum TV) is equally important. This is something I've known pretty much my entire adult life, but Kleem seems to add just the right amount of youthful glow to enhance the effect.
customer_reviews.author: ThinkmanTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: A-MAZING!✨
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING. I have been a skin therapist (Esthetician) for 14 years, I have tried many skin care products and brands. Regardless of all the expensive brands and spa brands I have tried, this is by far one of my favorites anti-wrinkle facial moisturizers. I started using it a month ago and I already can tell my skin has benefited from it tremendously! It moisturizes, it does not leave the skin dry or oily, it also targets fine lines and wrinkles like a BOSS! If you use it daily you will see results sooner than you think! I saw results after the first week. I won’t be changing face creams anytime soon 😊👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Lolipolly7

customer_reviews.title: This cream works! The container is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I rated this product overall as 4 stars was that the cover cracked on the top the first week that I had it so I could not take it to travel. That being said, the container the cream is in is awesome. I just ordered my 2nd jar. The plunger type top works down to the last drop on the bottom of the jar! I appreciate not having to put fingers into the jar to get the cream, adding bacteria to the contents. The amount that comes out is just right. The cream works well too with no perfume smells. I am not sure it removed any wrinkles but my skin is soft.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Seller sends spam.
customer_reviews.text: Product is ok. But the seller won’t stop sending me emails!
customer_reviews.author: TheAfterman

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to work, but after about the first week I started to get pimples even though it doesn't feel greasy and itchy red blotches on my neck. Had to stop using. I never went through an acne stage in my life until now.
customer_reviews.author: angelcakes2

customer_reviews.title: Revision - DON'T USE AROUND THE EYES
customer_reviews.text: Too strong for around the eyes. Now that I stopped, my vision is getting less blurry. It's good to remember the things we try may not work. I'm very satisfied with this product. As a Guy, I don't use a lot of stuff. And for this product, I only use it around the eyes. I've used products specifically made for the eye area (protient?), and my eyes will water for half a day. The only tip about applying an oil-based product like this is to leave it on at least 10 minutes, and blot off remaining oil - that from a dermatologist. It only takes about 10 minutes for the skin to absorb the active ingredients......
customer_reviews.author: Randy Prosser

customer_reviews.title: I think I will just stick to a very good moisturing cream without the retinol
customer_reviews.text: Tried Kleem for 3 weeks everday, but I think it makes my skin look and feel dry. I believe the ingredients in this product does not work for me. I think I will just stick to a very good moisturing cream without the retinol.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Safe for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to try since i have rosacea and tend to have oily skin in the summer. So far (5 weeks in) I have been using 3 to 4 times a week at night and have not had any redness/irritation and my skin is brighter with less noticeable fine lines. I love the scent and as for moisturizing properties, I have been using the Kleem Organics Vitamin C Serum underneath so I believe that is what is moisturizing my skin. I could only rate 4 stars because of this. I will definitely purchase again and can't wait to see what other products Kleem Organics will be introducing. I will also be recommending this product to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Homeychick

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Update: I will stand by my original review as nothing has changed. Don't get me wrong, anything I don't react to is good. Will finish this jar, but will not be reordering. I think there is more stuff in this cream than Retinol. I will find it hard to believe there is 2.5% as I have very sensitive skin and this doesn't bite at all. I will use this jar, but unsure I will order another. Will have to see the results then.
customer_reviews.author: NL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent moisturizer without the oily feel.
customer_reviews.text: So let me just say that I own and use a really really expensive skincare line. I have now bought this product for the 2nd time however, because I love it so much. I can't really say if it is this cream or my expensive ones that are helping my skin but I don't really care. I absolutely love the way this cream goes on, the way it makes my skin feel so soft and hydrated without feeling at all oily and the smell is divine! I use it primarily on my neck and chest and Love it. I'd definitely recommend you try it because it is worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: TRV

customer_reviews.title: Does nothing for fine lines. Smells nice.
customer_reviews.text: I have used an entire jar since 4/19. Today is 5/22. I used it faithfully every night. I haven’t seen any change in the tiny, fine lines around my eyes or at the edges of my mouth. Smells nice. Seems to moisturize ok. Considering the price for such a small amount of product with absolutely no change even in tiny fine lines, I can’t justify buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great product but...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much, I’ve put it automatic delivery. The reason I gave it four stars overall is because once I’ve used about 1/3 of the jar, it no longer pumps out. I’ve even tried storing it upside down and that doesn’t work. I have to unscrew the top which really isn’t a big deal but I wish the manufacturer would try a better pump option.
customer_reviews.author: lamp3009

customer_reviews.title: Hit add to your cart now! You won’t be disappointed! 😊
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer is absolutely amazing y’all!!! If your skin needs a pick me up you need to give this product a try! It actually does EVERYTHING it says! I know that some other people have posted reviews that it caused break outs but it has actually made my skin softer and smoother since I started using it. But I don’t over use it either. Mine came packaged beautifully, no problems at all. No spills or anything. Please if you are in your 40’s like me and are looking for a good addition to your beauty routine this is IT!!!! Don’t keep scrolling anymore!!! Hit ADD TO YOUR CART NOW! You won’t be disappointed! I promise!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Keith Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA and wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I like many like to try to purchase quality USA products. I have had my eye on this company for a while and decided to try one of the creams. I look for a balance of quality and price. I have found that some creams that cost $100s do no better than dimestore purchases. This cream is wonderful, the thoughtful packaging, the product is clean smelling, no perfume, no dies. I normally do not do reviews after one use but this product is wonderful I actually felt my skin tightening as it was soaking in. I can not wait to try more products from Kleem Organics!
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: I love the dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Even though I've only been using this product for a little over two weeks, I'm finding that my skin has become firmer and softer. I love the dispenser. It dispenses the exact amount of the product you need for both your face and neck, so there's no waste. My favorite part about using this is the scent. It reminds me of fresh-squeezed orange juice. It's so refreshing. I would recommend this cream to anyone with aging skin (I'm 65) or those with dry skin. It really works.
customer_reviews.author: B. Fidler

customer_reviews.title: Good moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this moisturizer! I’m not thrilled with how it’s dispensed because it’s kind of hard to control how much you get and not wanting to waste it if I get too much, I likely use more than I need to. Sometimes I end up feeling a little greasy at the end of the day. I am not wearing any makeup because I’m only at home or wearing a mask due to Corona Virus, but I’m a little pearly of how this would hold up under makeup for a day. For now, my skin looks great - dewy and bright!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: May not be suitable to all skin types
customer_reviews.text: I have dry sensitive skin, I started using it about a month ago day and night, after few days of using the area around my nose and lips started to burn when applying then it became too dry and red, so I started applying another moisturiser then I apply it and my skin is better now. I hesitated to write this review because I’m not sure the problem is in the product or in the way I used it but in the end I decided to write my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Bara AlSayed

customer_reviews.title: product arrived damaged like it had been used before
customer_reviews.text: I stopped buying this for a short while because it's pricey and I looked for less expensive alternatives. I decided to get this again, but it arrived leaking out of the container, and there was no safety seal or any kind of seal on the product. It looks like it had been used.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: A gift that keeps on giving
customer_reviews.text: Love Kleem it smells wonderful on the skin and leaves my skin soft and smooth. The scent is so perfect my little dog wants to lick it off my face. It has kind of a citrus smell to it. Very wonderful. Since I am elderly I am happy to find a product that works just got his sisters. So I buy a bottle of claim for my friends for their birthdays are special anniversary gifts. I have a lot of claim mail being used by people in my circle. I’m really proud. They all raved about it and love it as much as I do
customer_reviews.author: Marti Settle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cream for ultra sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased to find a product ingredients of this quality. I am ultra sensitive and unable to tolerate many skin products. Living in California skin cream is not something I would do without. The cream absorbs well and makes my skin feel great. Also received a product guide from the company on how to utilize their products fully. Easy steps to succeed. They also make an Eye Cream which I may try next. Will follow up on the effect regarding wrinkles etc. in a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: Nobody

customer_reviews.title: Product not the same.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for about a year and I’ve loved it. However, the last shipment I received seems different in texture but mostly in smell. It doesn’t have that clean citrus smell..? I’m wondering if the product has changed, or is it possible that I received a bad batch. There’s no seller information to contact someone. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Lee

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this. Sadly however after just a few uses I realized all it was doing was adding a waxy residue to my skin. If I took my finger and rubbed against my cheek it would come away with a Waxy residue much like you used to find on the outside of an old waxed Coke cup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this moisturizer! I bought my 1st one and had to buy 3 more for my mom and sisters as a gift. They like it a lot too. After leaving it at night, the next morning my skin looked brighter, younger and tighter. This is a great product that I'll keep using.
customer_reviews.author: Lili Hervi

customer_reviews.title: plump skin
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered my fourth jar of this Kleem product. WOW!!! I have tried practically every product that says it reduces fine lines and wrinkles. I need not try any other product. This cream has virtually plumped up my skin and it looks radiant. I have received multiple compliments about my skin. I am 68 years old and time is my enemy but Kleem has rejuvenated my skin. I would recommend everyone to try it. It's worth every penny. thank you Kleem
customer_reviews.author: marleneo

customer_reviews.title: You can’t fix ugly?
customer_reviews.text: This was for my wife. I can’t give a bad review because her skin looked like a band of monkeys were hanging on her face for years. She still looks horrible. Short of a face transplant there isn’t a cream or a potion strong enough to make her beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Chad E. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great as a moisturizer, but made me break out
customer_reviews.text: I have a persistent dry spot on my face and after I used this it started going away. Unfortunately I also started breaking out. I discontinued use and then continued, thinking that the breakouts may be a coincidence but it happened again. It's unfortunate since the product otherwise seemed to work well. And the smell is a very very sweet citrus scent, which I really like. Side note, a lot of the reviews here read like they are fake. Which makes me a bit suspicious about how much I can really trust the ingredients list for this product...
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful night cream, but not good for micro-needling
customer_reviews.text: I have been using anti-aging products since my early 20s, and now at 35 I still look like a teenager, lol. So yeah... my skin is pretty important to me! I bought this night cream on a suggestion from a friend, and I really love it! It's very rich and moisturizing, as well as having retinol in it to help resurface and smooth the skin. It's perfect to use at night before bed to give your skin some overnight TLC. However... I wouldn't recommend using it if you have used a derma roller recently. The retinol can cause it to sting pretty badly.
customer_reviews.author: J McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this over a month but I see no real difference. I can use straight Vitamin E oil and my skin looks just as good. It does moisturize but too pricey not to see that big of a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Allows for easy foundation application
customer_reviews.text: I did much research to determine the best moisturizer for my aging skin - this product contains all that are recommended to include Retinal and Hyaluronic acid. I can already see the difference in the look of my foundation by the end of the day. Before this product the dry patches on my skin would show through the foundation and my skin looked rough, but this product stops that and my foundation looks good until I take it off. Non-greasy, but very moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S. Norman

customer_reviews.title: My skin felt better right away
customer_reviews.text: I’m only 3 days in & absolutely love this product! My skin feels soft, supple, and smooth. My neck was dry & tight causing wrinkles, itching & looked prematurely old. This cream has fixed that within 3 days. I just stated the vitamin c serum today. I especially like that the cream bottle dispenses the correct amount each time so you don’t use too much or too little. Can’t wait to keep seeing great results!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey McRoberts

customer_reviews.title: Excellent moisturizer, awful delivery system
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great although a bit expensive. The problem is the jar it comes in is this different kind of container where you push down on the top to get the moisturizer. It often clogs resulting in half the product going down the sink or on your mirror no matter how hard you try. This might be acceptable with a less expensive product, but paying as much as you do for this product, it really is a deal breaker. Great moisturizer though.
customer_reviews.author: Ragnar Lothbrook

customer_reviews.title: A great value
customer_reviews.text: I am older and living in a hot dry area. The moisturizer does a good job of hydrating and does not have a waxy feel to it after it soaks in. Hotter areas I travel to can have an affect on the creams I use. So far this cream out performs oil of Olay (even the new whips), clarion and the IT cream. Smells fresh and works for both night and day creams, even under powder or cream foundation
customer_reviews.author: DL in Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Lemon meringue face! 🍋🍋🍋
customer_reviews.text: Heavenly, lemony scent - just beautiful!! I waited until I’d used it for awhile before recommending it, but I do so now, without hesitation. It’s just a skin cream, not a plastic surgeon in a bottle, so I wasn’t expecting miracles, and I didn’t get any. But if you’re looking for a nice, light, non-greasy formula and want to feel as though you just fell face first into a lemon meringue pie, then by all means go for it! Love love love this product! Now, what else do they make? ❤️
customer_reviews.author: PilatesGirl

customer_reviews.title: A disappointment
customer_reviews.text: For all of the amazing reviews, I was expecting a much better product. This lotion is thin and does not absorb into my skin. When I wash my face the next morning, I can feel the lotion coming off as if it was just sitting on top of my skin all night! I do not enjoy the citrus-y smell and would much prefer unscented. There are no fragrances listed in the ingredients so not sure where that smell is even coming from. I am returning this and going to stick with more trusted brands.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: Good product but not enough for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I love the ingredients and packaging. It absorb well and fast into the skin. Perfect size. I have kind of oily/ combination skin with some mild acne, it didn’t make it worse. I use with hyaluronoc acid serum which helps even more. The hidrating proprieties of the product were ok and worth the money. Since I use a bunch of acne products my skin becomes hard to hidrate sometimes, for this reason I will be trying something else. So for me the product was ok. If you have normal, oily, combination skin it will be very good for you. If u have very dry or acne skin you might use this product with a serum to reach enough hidration.
customer_reviews.author: Daniele

customer_reviews.title: Works better than other highly rated creams on amazon
customer_reviews.text: Bought this retinol after using another highly rated cream from Amazon. I can tell a difference already with the kleem retinol. I never saw a change using the other retinol, even after using it every night until it was emptied. I would purchase this again. I'm 35, my skin will breakout to certain products, but never did with this.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Mcknight

customer_reviews.title: "It works for me"
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's a little early yet but I had a few compliments lately on how good I look. It's very moisturizing and no problems so far. My skin doesn't have that tired look. I apply after bathing an let it absorb into my skin and dry before applying my foundation. Scent not bad. I'm also using a exfoliating skin cleaning tool, so all's well with my skin. I will have to update this for a more accurate review after using awhile. Thanks Kleem!
customer_reviews.author: Maya J

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Love this moisturizer!! I have tried using a lot of moisturizers and end up very disappointed in them because they will make my eyes water to the point of looking like I'm crying. This moisturizer does not make my eyes water, feels great on my face soft and not greasy but a soft texture for makeup to go on smooth and the smell is wonderful. I will be a customer for life. Thanks so much for such a GREAT product. Next I want to try the eye cream, If it's anything like the face moisturizer I will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend for seniors.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the smell. But, it did nothing to improve my anti aging skin. It may work for younger ladies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It helps with sensitive combination skin!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed results almost immediately. Before this product all I was using was witch hazel. Now, I use this product after I shower and wow... I get carded again! Lol. I had problems with dry and itchy skin in certain places and oily in others. Now my skin has evened out for the most part. I'm happy with this product and will continue to buy it. As a matter of fact, I just bought more!
customer_reviews.author: sai

customer_reviews.title: Caused a bacterial infection
customer_reviews.text: This product started out fine but I started to notice a large amount of red, dry, patchy spots on my face. I went to my dermatologist, and she said I had a bacterial infection. This was the only new product I had been using. I stopped using it and the patches cleared up. I used it one more time, just to verify that it was the product causing the problems. My skin was inflamed! it was so terrible. I had to be on medication to get my skin issues to clear up
customer_reviews.author: B-Rey

customer_reviews.title: Does not moisturize
customer_reviews.text: It smells minty and that's all about it. Not moisturize at all
customer_reviews.author: P. F. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Causes breakouts
customer_reviews.text: I am not a fan! It made me breakout badly. I use Olay with no issues. The reviews for this grabbed me. There was a card in mine to get free product for a review. This makes me leery now about all the other reviews. It also does not list retinol in the ingredients. The smell is amazing, however the random break out makes me dislike this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nic W

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter-in-law as a gift and decided to get a jar for myself. I love it. My face feels tighter in the morning, with a slight reddish tint that fades right away. I feel it's giving me enough 'skin irritation' in the night that generates healing and prompting tighter skin. I'll see how it goes after another month. So far I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: LoveToRead

customer_reviews.title: Smells and Feels Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been using this long enough to see results, but I'm living for it. It smells like orange sherbet, and is very lightweight and smooth. Also much cheaper than the cream I was using before. If this makes you break out or gives you painful red/dry skin, you should try mixing it with a gentle non-medicated lotion for a while so that your skin can get used to it. That's a normal reaction to retinol products when you first start them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Rigley

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Its a great cream, i like the consistency of it. I've tried other retinol products and caused redness, but this one hasn't. I have started to notice a slight difference in fine lines and it's been slightly over a week. I can't wait for future results. My only but with this product is that it's not fragrance free. It does have a scent to it but its not overwhelming. I will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Fin

customer_reviews.title: Good so far...
customer_reviews.text: I'm using the 3 part system and I'm only on week 2. I like, but sometimes I feel like it soaks in so much that my skin feels a little dry. That might mean that it soaks in really well, or does it evaporate? Not sure, but I also use Elemis and Dove, so when it feels a bit dry on my cheek bones, I just add some more moisturizer. Still, my skin looks better, so I'm wavering between a 4 and a 5 and decided to give the benefit of the doubt...
customer_reviews.author: Diana

product_meta.title: Anti Aging Retinol Moisturizer Cream: for Face, Neck & Décolleté with 2.5% Retinol and Hyaluronic Acid. Best Day and Night Anti Wrinkle Cream for Men and Women - Results in 5 Weeks
feature_bullets: 💦 FACIAL MOISTURIZER FOR DEEP HYDRATATION 💦 with the best anti aging face cream for woman & men. Only this anti aging cream with Retinol guarantees collagen and elastin production to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and age spots

⛲ RESULTS GUARANTEED - The best face moisturizer that visibly smoothes wrinkles for a firmer and younger-looking skin. A face lotion for women formulated with 5 proven Bio-Active ingredients: 2.5% Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E, Green Tea & Jojoba Oil

🌳 ONLY NATURAL & ORGANIC INGREDIENTS 🌳 - The ingredients inside this Retinol firming cream work in synergy with your skin, as our night cream anti aging is Parabens and Alcohol FREE. Face lotion MADE in USA and endorsed by PETA as being Cruelty-Free

🎯 INCREASE YOUR SKIN FIRMNESS AND ELASTICITY Today with this anti wrinkle Retinol cream through powerful anti aging vitamins that smoothen skin texture for a healthy radiant complexion. This anti aging face cream doesn’t clog pores. No oily or sticky feeling

⭐ YOUR SATISFACTION MATTERS - Our success as a skin care company depends on your grade of satisfaction. This Retinol facial cream has been elected THE BEST ANTI AGING SKIN PRODUCT of the year - Get yours today and for your friends and family too 🎁
